newsitem.title: CANADA: Bombardier to sell turboprop to MBA Pty.
newsitem.headline: Bombardier to sell turboprop to MBA Pty.

text.p: Bombardier Inc said on Thursday that MBA Pty of Papua New Guinea agreed to buy one de Havilland Dash 8 Series 200 turboprop aircraft, with an option to buy an additional plane.
Value of the contract for the firm order, including spare parts and training, is about US$12.5 million. Delivery is planned for September 1998, Bombardier said.
